# Unicode.GeneralCategory.control

**Case**

A C0 or C1 control code.

## Declaration

```swift
case control
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Control` (abbreviated `Cc`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.control
